data.title: Kenyon Martin, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Kenyon Martin stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Kenyon Martin - Points

Kenyon Martin scores a career high 31 points (2023)

On March 23, 2023, Kenyon Martin set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 31 points in Houston's road loss against Memphis, 130-125. He also had 6 rebounds and 2 blocks. He shot 10/13 from two, 2/5 from three, shooting at 66.7% from the field. He also shot 5/8 from the free-throw line.

Kenyon Martin - Rebounds

Kenyon Martin grabs a career high 19 rebounds (2021)

On February 16, 2021, Kenyon Martin set his career high in rebounds in a G-League game. That day he grabbed 19 rebounds in Rio Grande Valley Vipers's home loss against Osceola Magic, 96-99. He also had 23 points, 2 assists, 2 steals and 1 block.

Kenyon Martin - Assists

Kenyon Martin gives a career high 7 assists (2021)

On May 08, 2021, Kenyon Martin set his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 7 assists in Houston's road loss against Milwaukee, 141-133. He also had 26 points, 7 rebounds.

Kenyon Martin - Steals

Kenyon Martin has a career high 3 steals (2021)

On March 13, 2021, Kenyon Martin tied his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 3 steals in Houston's road loss against Utah, 114-99. He also had 15 points, 10 rebounds and 1 assist.

Kenyon Martin - Blocks

Kenyon Martin blocks a career high 5 shots (2021)

On February 12, 2021, Kenyon Martin set his career high in blocks in a G-League game. That day he went for 5 blocks in Rio Grande Valley Vipers's road win against Agua Caliente C, 95-99. He also had 14 points, 12 rebounds and 2 assists.
